title: Jo Pavey: how I'm training for the Olympics as a 46-year-old mum of two
text:
Jo Pavey is hunting a sixth Olympic appearance at Tokyo 2020. She reveals how time-starved parents can make exercise an enjoyable part of their family routine

Since staggering bleary-eyed into the chaotic world of parenthood, British runner Jo Pavey has quickly discovered how hard it can be to find time to exercise amid the daily swirl of chocolate-stained playdates, school drop-offs and lengthy dinner table negotiations over carrots.

But the 46-year-old mother of two, who is hoping to reach a record-equalling sixth Olympic Games next year, has learned to stop regarding fitness and family life as rival spheres. Instead, she's trying to unite the two.

“I realised that if you are struggling...
description: Jo Pavey is hunting a sixth Olympic appearance at Tokyo 2020.
